entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times early this afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
